data.name: Fractal Fly
data.detailed_description:
In Fractal Fly what you do is simply… fly! There is nothing to win, just the world around you to explore: Fractals are computer generated landscapes, but you don’t have to know how it works, all is already setup for you so that you can just enjoy it. There are countless details in a fractal, you can lose yourself in the landscapes, just admiring and listening to the peaceful music that accompany it. Fractal fly is about relaxing and contemplating.
You can also morph all the landscape and discover even more details and shapes.

When you download Fractal Fly, you’ll have access to a free fractal. The others are in app purchase, but you will be able to preview them with a pre-determined ride in the fractal, and if you like it, you can buy it, and you’ll be able to fly everywhere you want in it!

Fractal Fly runs with or without a VR headset.
So even if you don’t have a VR headset, give it a try, it’s free!
data.about_the_game:

There is nothing to win, just the world around you to explore: Fractals are computer generated landscapes, but you don’t have to know how it works, all is already setup for you so that you can just enjoy it. data.short_description: Explore imaginary landscapes, like you're flying in another world. Observe and dive into those chaotic shapes all around you. And even transform them! You're totally free to move where you want, you will discover a tremendous variety of shapes and colors!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least NVidia GTX 970 or equivalent for VR mode
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works on screen as well as with a VR headset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
